mapper.select: SELECT * FROM NOTICE ORDER BY NOTICENO DESC
mapper.insert: insert into notice values ((select max(noticeNo) + 1 from notice), #{noticetitle}, sysdate, #{noticewriter}, #{noticecontent}, #{original_filepath, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rename_filepath, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, NOTICENO, NOTICETITLE, NOTICEDATE FROM ( SELECT * FROM NOTICE ORDER BY NOTICEDATE DESC)) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 3
